body_html:
Unfortunately, bazel inserts the shebang line #!/usr/bin/env python to the python files in "builds". Therefore even with this change we are blocked by that bazel bug to be able to build on a python3 only environment.
You can see more information here:
#15618

The issue is escalated to bazel team, and we are waiting for a resolution from them.

Unfortunately, bazel inserts the shebang line #!/usr/bin/env python to the python files in "builds". Therefore even with this change we are blocked by that bazel bug to be able to build on a python3 only environment.
You can see more information here:
#15618
The issue is escalated to bazel team, and we are waiting for a resolution from them.
body:
Unfortunately, bazel inserts the shebang line `#!/usr/bin/env python` to the python files in "builds". Therefore even with this change we are blocked by that bazel bug to be able to build on a python3 only environment.
You can see more information here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/15618

The issue is escalated to bazel team, and we are waiting for a resolution from them.
